paragraphs.text: Seite 1 Zeile 1 This chapter uses Volto to change displaying the dates in Seite 1 Zeile 2 talkview and talklistview. To meet the same requirements in Seite 1 Zeile 3 classic Plone see the chapter Turning Talks into Events.

Seite 2 Zeile 1 We use a technique called component shadowing to override an Seite 2 Zeile 2 existing Volto component with our local custom version, without Seite 2 Zeile 3 having to modify Volto's source code at all. You have to place the

Seite 4 Zeile 1 This chapter uses Volto to change displaying the dates in Seite 4 Zeile 2 talkview and talklistview. To meet the same requirements in Seite 4 Zeile 3 classic Plone see the chapter Turning Talks into Events.
